title: The Other Side of the Tracks

sources.title: The Haunting Of Amelia (The Other Side Of The Tracks) | Full Thriller Movie
sources.description:
The Haunting Of Amelia (The Other Side Of The Tracks) - A young man (Brendan Fehr) whose life has been on hold for ten years while he mourns the tragic death of his high school girlfriend falls for a waitress who is the spitting image of his lost love, while his best friend (Chad Lindberg) urges him to move on. Tania Raymonde co-stars in this supernatural romance.
2008. Stars: Brendan Fehr, Shirley Knight, Chad Lindberg
